languages.text: "Да. За свою жизнь этот нечестивец успел отяготить душу свою многими грехами, мерзостными и вопиющими. Его исповеди были подобны величественному катехизису, перечисляющему свойственные человеку пороки и гнусности".

"It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious acts. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing Humankind's immanent vices and enormities."
languages.original_text: "Да. За свою жизнь этот нечестивец успел отяготить душу свою многими грехами, мерзостными и вопиющими. Его исповеди были подобны величественному катехизису, перечисляющему свойственные человеку пороки и гнусности".

traits.locale_text: "It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious sins. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing humankind's immanent vices and enormities."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “确实如此。那个堕落之人的一生，曾犯下过无数卑鄙、恶劣的罪行，他的灵魂不堪重负。他的忏悔就像一本巨大的教义，上面列举了无数人类固有的恶习和罪行。”
languages.original_text: "It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious acts. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing Humankind's immanent vices and enormities."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。那个堕落之人的一生，曾犯下过无数卑鄙、恶劣的罪行，他的灵魂不堪重负。他的忏悔就像一本巨大的教义，上面列举了无数人类固有的恶习和罪行。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Lo es. A lo largo de su vida, el muy réprobo cargó su alma de numerosos actos flagrantes y viles. Sus confesiones eran análogas a un gran catecismo, pues listaba los vicios y gravedades inherentes de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious acts. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing Humankind's immanent vices and enormities."

traits.locale_text: «Lo es. A lo largo de su vida, el muy réprobo cargó su alma de numerosos pecados flagrantes y viles. Sus confesiones eran análogas a un gran catecismo, pues listaba los vicios y gravedades inherentes de la Humanidad».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「ええ。かの堕落者は、生涯を通じてさまざまな卑劣で悪辣な魂に重荷を負わせました。彼の懺悔は、人類の内在的な悪徳と非道を列挙した壮大なカテキズムに似ていましたね」
languages.original_text: "It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious acts. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing Humankind's immanent vices and enormities."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ。かの堕落者は、生涯を通じてさまざまな卑劣で悪辣な魂に罪を負わせました。彼の懺悔は、人類の内在的な悪徳と非道を列挙した壮大なカテキズムに似ていましたね」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Ja. Der Schurke hatte im Laufe seines Lebens viele üble und unerhörte Taten auf seine Seele geladen. Seine Beichte klang wie ein großer Katechismus, der die Laster und Abseitigkeiten auflistet, die der Menschheit innewohnen."
languages.original_text: "It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious acts. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing Humankind's immanent vices and enormities."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Der Schurke hatte im Laufe seines Lebens viele üble und unerhörte Sünden auf seine Seele geladen. Seine Beichte klang wie ein großer Katechismus, der die Laster und Abseitigkeiten auflistet, die der Menschheit innewohnen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « En effet. Tout au long de sa vie, ce dépravé a commis les actes les plus infâmes et les plus scandaleux. Ses confessions se rapprochaient d'une longue liste d'énormités et de vices inhérents à l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious acts. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing Humankind's immanent vices and enormities."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Tout au long de sa vie, ce dépravé a commis les péchés les plus infâmes et les plus scandaleux. Ses confessions se rapprochaient d'une longue liste d'énormités et de vices inhérents à l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Doğru. O günahkârın kötülükleri ve korkunç eylemleri, yaşamı boyunca ona ağırlık olmuş. Günah çıkarışı, İnsanlığın doğasında bulunan bütün özürlerin ve şerrin sıralandığı büyük bir ilmihâl gibiydi."
languages.original_text: "It is. Over the course of his life, that reprobate had burdened his soul with many vile and egregious acts. His confessions were akin to a grand catechism listing Humankind's immanent vices and enormities."

traits.locale_text: "Doğru. O günahkârın kötülükleri ve korkunç eylemleri yaşamı boyunca ona ağırlık yaptı. Günah çıkarmaları, İnsanlığın doğasında bulunan bütün özürlerin ve şerrin listelendiği büyük bir ilmihâl gibiydi."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
